H3.text: what team did jeremy lin go to. Houston Rockets

A4.text: Lin signed with his hometown Golden State Warriors in 2010.

A5.text: Lin was waived by both the Warriors and the Houston Rockets before joining the New York Knicks.

A6.text: Jeremy Lin was signed by the Houston Rockets.

A7.text: The Warriors added Harvard guard Jeremy Lin to their roster with a one-year partially guaranteed contract containing a second-year team option.
